title: Hard Lag Issues
body:
Hi,
I have been having this issue for a good while now.  When I am playing League, My ping will continually (but predictably) fluctuate between 30 to 1000, creating an uncontrollable lag.  I checked this problem with other online activities (namely Agar.io), and the same predictable lag spikes occurred there too.  This happened on my school WiFi, as well as my home WiFi.  When I connect to a wired connection, the problem disappears.  My brother who plays League at home played a game with me over WiFi, and he had no trouble while I continued to lag.

So I'm compelled to believe the problem is with my computer's ability to use a wireless connection, but I have no idea how to fix it.  If anyone has advice on how to solve this issue, please let me know!

Thanks.

replies.body: Reading your description, I had a hunch that you might be playing on wi-fi.  The kind of symptoms you're reporting sounds like packet loss which will cause sudden spikes like this.  A [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of these matches can help confirm that.  Your best bet would be to try a wired connection or close the distance between your pc and router (though no guarantee).  A [power cycle ](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic)of your router could help as well in case it's gotten a bit clogged up.  I hope that helps!
